name: Fairy Mahjong Premium - The New 3D Majong
name_original: Fairy Mahjong Premium - The New 3D Majong
description:
Fairy Mahjong Premium is a 3D mahjong-like game with a twist.
It is a highly innovative and addictive 3D skill-based puzzle game. Combining outstanding levels, colorful graphics and great audio effects it is one of the most original and fun games in the Apple App Store.
Fairy Mahjong Premium combines mahjong and match three game-plays with accurate touch controls in a 3D environment.

* 45 levels
* Beautiful themed 3D graphics
* Easy, normal and hard game modes
* Great soundtracks and audio effects
* Fun and addictive game-play elements
